course_description: This course offers practical conversation instruction based on short films. Thematic in nature, this course covers all tenses, advanced grammatical structures, and a wide range of vocabulary. This course does not count towards the minor in Spanish but can satisfy language requirement.
sections: Class Nbr: 4396, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: M. Davis, Status: Open
